name: DVD Loopkicks & friends - Martial Arts Tricking
description:
SPECIAL OFFER: BUY 1, GET 2 !!!

Tricking-History! - Loopkicks & friends – The classic is back!

TRAILER:
http://www.youtube.com/watch_popup?v=YH2Ampu6jSs&vq=hd480

Featuring many of the worlds best trickers:
Anis Cheurfa - Jeremy Marinas - Daniel Graham - Sesshoumaru - Crazy Asian - Doeni - Many Brown - Chris Devera - Gemma Nguyen
and many more…

The best of over 100 hours of footage from loopkicks camps and gatherings all over the world.

Disc1: 135 Minutes of original tricking and crazy fun!

Disc2: 80 Minutes of Tricks Tutorials. Let the pros teach you how to Backflip, 540, Cork, Cheat900, Jackknife and 15 more tricks...

Highly praised by the Tricking community! – proffessionally produced by filmmaker Tong-Len!

Language: English
Format: NTSC (works also in PAL !) Region Code Free (0)
